fullText.originalText: Cabbage NFT can be traded for real estate on Mars, auntie paid with Bitcoin for salted duck eggs. The fish stall accepts Ethereum, we're mining coins while steaming buns
fullText.baseText: 白菜NFT能换火星房产，大妈用比特币买咸鸭蛋，鱼摊收以太坊，我们蒸馒头时挖矿
fullText.finalText: 数字大白菜，火星CBD通行证，广场舞阿姨BTC购咸蛋。海鲜档ETH结算，馒头机即矿机，算力蒸蒸日上

fullText.originalText: Quantum wok can cook parallel universe dishes, my instant noodles entangled with KFC chicken. The fridge creates time paradoxes, yesterday's leftovers become tomorrow's banquet
fullText.baseText: 量子炒锅能做平行宇宙菜肴，我的泡面和肯德基鸡纠缠了，冰箱制造时间悖论，昨天的剩饭变成明天的宴席
fullText.finalText: 薛定谔的锅，烹制多重宇宙佛跳墙。老坛酸菜与疯狂星期四量子纠缠，冰箱开启时间循环，剩饭秒变满汉全席
